name: Veggie Chips
preparation: Wash and shake kale, so it’s slightly damp. Working in batches, spread kale out on a Multipurpose Tray without overlapping. Season with your favorite Epicure seasoning and microwave on high for 1 minute intervals until crisp.

Using a 4-in-1 Mandoline, slice potatoes and yams. Working in batches, spread slices out on a Multipurpose Tray without overlapping. Season with your favorite Epicure seasoning. Microwave on high until crispy, 3–4 minutes (yams may take longer), until crisp.
tips: Cooking times will vary depending on natural sugar content of the vegetables and microwave wattage. For best results, consistent supervision is recommended.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
